attributes.action: Stop using paper for school and instead use computers and laptops to save trees
attributes.additional_details: Of a school of 100 teachers annually the school would use 250,000 sheets of paper which is never used again or sometimes not recycled and using technology can help decrease the number of trees needed to be cut down
attributes.background: we have been going through a lot of paper through the past years and we then throw them away.we need to start using what we invented.If we start using technology instead of paper then that will save a lot of trees.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this would the responsibility of the school and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You would also need to give your full name to start a petition.
